content.original: Based on the weapon used by infantry for centuries, the Mech Mortar fires a small shell in a high arc that falls onto the target. Though the Mech Mortar was created by the Terran Hegemony, by 2835 the Succession Wars had relegated it to history. With the reintroduction of the Anti-Missile System, engineers revived the Mech Mortar concept. The munitions used by the mortars, though often possessing limited guidance packages, weren't destroyed by AMS systems in tests. Mortar shells also proved very adaptable, accepting several types of payloads.

content.content: Созданный на основе оружия, веками использовавшегося пехотой, версия мортиры для мехов стреляет небольшим снарядом по высокой дуге, который падает на цель. Хотя мортиры были созданы ещё Гегемонией Терры, к 2835 году из-за Войн за Наследие они ушли в историю. С возрождением противоракетной системы, инженеры возродили и концепцию мортир для мехов. Боеприпасы, используемые мортирами, хотя часто и имели ограниченные возможности наведения, на тестах не сбивались системами AMS. Снаряды мортир также оказались очень адаптируемыми, допуская различные их типы.

content.original: The Thunderbolt Missile was developed for the arenas of Solaris. Unlike most missile systems, the Thunderbolt was a single missile that smashed into its target. Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.

Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.

content.original: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller ﬁghters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.prevOriginal: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller ﬁghters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.content: Не столь мощная, как ракеты Arrow «воздух-воздух», представленные лиранцами и Волками, эта гораздо более компактная версия ракеты «воздух-воздух» дебютировала в составе союзных воздушно-космических сил герцогства Тамаринд и движения сопротивления герцогини Алис Руссо-Марик. Эти так называемые лёгкие ракеты класса «воздух-воздух» (LAA), имеющие меньшие размеры и меньшее сопротивление при работе в атмосфере, могут переноситься малой техникой. При должной смекалке команда техов может прикрутить их и к меху в качестве средства ПВО.

content.original: The BattleMech Taser uses a specially modified metal harpoon that sends a massive electrical pulse down a wire connected to the firing unit. This electrical pulse is designed to overload the target's electrical system and hopefully cause the target unit to shut down. This allows the Taser carrying unit to capture the target rather than destroying it. Uses Taser Ammo.

content.original: And the Lord spake, saying, 'First shalt thou take out the Holy Pin. Then, shalt thou count to three. No more. No less. Three shalt be the number thou shalt count, and the number of the counting shall be three. Four shalt thou not count, nor either count thou two, excepting that thou then proceed to three. Five is right out. Once the number three, being the third number, be reached, then, lobbest thou thy Holy Hand Grenade of Antioch towards thy foe, who, being naughty in My sight, shall snuff it.'

content.original: The Medium-Range Missile Launcher was designed by scientists at Luthien Armor Works. MRMs are dead-fire missiles that are fired more like lasers than missiles. In order to pack as many missiles as possible into one salvo, scientists removed guidance systems and made the whole package smaller. Though this was seen as a step backwards in technological development, the inexpensive and deadly MRMs have spread throughout the Draconis Combine and to many mercenary units. 100 rounds.
content.prevOriginal: The Medium-Range Missile Launcher was designed by scientists at Luthien Armor Works. MRMs are dead-fire missiles that are fired more like lasers than missiles. In order to pack as many missiles as possible into one salvo, scientists removed guidance systems and made the whole package smaller. Though this was seen as a step backwards in technological development, the inexpensive and deadly MRMs have spread throughout the Draconis Combine and to many mercenary units. 100 rounds.
content.content: Ракетная установка средней дальности была разработана учеными из Luthien Armor Works. Для того чтобы вместить как можно больше ракет в один залп, ученые удалили из ракет внутренние системы наведения и сделали корпус меньше. Хотя это считалось шагом назад в технологическом плане, недорогие и смертоносные MRM распространились по всему Синдикату Дракона и среди многих наемников. 100 rounds.

content.original: A Hand Held Rotary AC2. Theres a inscription on it 'This is my rifle. There are many like it, but this one is mine. My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life. My rifle, without me, is useless. Without my rifle, I am useless.'
content.prevOriginal: A Hand Held Rotary AC2. Theres a inscription on it 'This is my rifle. There are many like it, but this one is mine. My rifle is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life. My rifle, without me, is useless. Without my rifle, I am useless.'
content.content: Ручная Rotary AC2. Надпись на ней гласит: «Это моя винтовка. Таких винтовок много, но эта - моя. Моя винтовка - мой лучший друг. Это - моя жизнь. Я должен научиться владеть оружием так же, как владею своей жизнью. Без меня моя винтовка бесполезна. Без моей винтовки я бесполезен.»

content.original: The Hatchet is a melee attack weapon equipped on BattleMechs. While most 'Mechs are equipped with ranged weaponry, melee weaponry is also both feasible and useful due to increased damage potential (over a punch) and a lack of heat buildup.

content.original: The Hatchet is a melee attack weapon equipped on BattleMechs. While most 'Mechs are equipped with ranged weaponry, melee weaponry is also both feasible and useful due to increased damage potential (over a punch) and a lack of heat buildup.
content.prevOriginal: The Hatchet is a melee attack weapon equipped on BattleMechs. While most 'Mechs are equipped with ranged weaponry, melee weaponry is also both feasible and useful due to increased damage potential (over a punch) and a lack of heat buildup.
content.content: Топор - это оружие ближнего боя, которым оснащаются мехи. В то время как большинство мехов оснащены оружием дальнего боя, оружие ближнего боя также полезно из-за повышенного потенциального урона (при ударе) и отсутствия тепловыделения.

content.original: A Basic IFF (Identify Friend/Foe) Jamming unit that prevents enemy to ascertain a units allegiance replacing a cockpits sensor systems. Creates a low level ECM field but cannot enable Stealth. Can be used additionally to ECM Equipment.
content.prevOriginal: A Basic IFF (Identify Friend/Foe) Jamming unit that prevents enemy to ascertain a units allegiance replacing a cockpits sensor systems. Creates a low level ECM field but cannot enable Stealth. Can be used additionally to ECM Equipment.
content.content: Базовый блок помех ИДВ (идентификация «друг/враг»), не позволяет противнику установить принадлежность юнита, заменяет сенсорные системы кабины. Создает поле ECM низкого уровня, но не может включить Stealth. Может использоваться дополнительно к оборудованию ECM.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: Снижает эффективность юнитов, скрытых ECM и Stealth.

content.original: While initially little more than bulked out hatchets that traded a cutting edge for crushing ability when they first appeared in the Solaris Games, has the weapon evolved into the heavier and distinctive definitive model. Despite finally reaching a production grade standard, the unwieldy and unbalanced nature of the mace compared to the hatchet or sword has made them rarely seen in general military 'Mech designs.
content.prevOriginal: While initially little more than bulked out hatchets that traded a cutting edge for crushing ability when they first appeared in the Solaris Games, has the weapon evolved into the heavier and distinctive definitive model. Despite finally reaching a production grade standard, the unwieldy and unbalanced nature of the mace compared to the hatchet or sword has made them rarely seen in general military 'Mech designs.
content.content: Первоначально оружие было не более чем громоздкими топорами, на которых заменили режущую кромку дробящей, когда они впервые появились в Solaris Games, но теперь это оружие превратилось в более тяжелую и законченную модель. Несмотря на то, что они наконец достигли производственного стандарта качества, их редко встретишь в конструкции военных мехов из-за громоздкого и несбалансированного характера булавы по сравнению с топором или мечом.

content.original: Introduced in the late 31st Century on Solaris VII, the Combat Shield is a movable piece of armor that can be mounted on BattleMechs. The shield was first introduced as a method to add protection for a MechWarrior fighting in the arenas of Solaris. Shields are primary defensive equipment used to protect a 'Mech from Weapons fire and some forms of physical attacks. Equipping more than 1 wont yield additional effects, does not stack with other combat shields.

content.original: The Sword is a melee attack weapon developed in 3058 by the Draconis Combine as an 'honorable' alternative to the 'crude' Lyran Hatchet, the Sword inflicts almost as much damage as a Hatchet and offers a better hit probability due to its exceptional balance.
content.prevOriginal: The Sword is a melee attack weapon developed in 3058 by the Draconis Combine as an 'honorable' alternative to the 'crude' Lyran Hatchet, the Sword inflicts almost as much damage as a Hatchet and offers a better hit probability due to its exceptional balance.
content.content: Меч - это оружие ближнего боя, разработанное в 3058 году Синдикатом Дракона в качестве «достойной» альтернативы «грубому» лиранскому топору. Меч наносит почти такой же урон, как топор, и предлагает лучшую вероятность попадания из-за его исключительного баланса.

content.original: This is a physical weapon and hits like a normal weapon.
content.prevOriginal: This is a physical weapon and hits like a normal weapon.
content.content: Это физическое оружие и оно бьет как обычное оружие.

content.original: Perfected Thermal Vision on a BattleMech took much time and dedication by Doering, the Optical 320 Suite managed to produce some amazing results for its time. First released in 2950, this model allowed Mech's limited vision of heat sources, while removing backwash and interference from 'Mech weapon systems and operation by adding very heavy shielding to the Thermal Imaging Unit.
content.prevOriginal: Perfected Thermal Vision on a BattleMech took much time and dedication by Doering, the Optical 320 Suite managed to produce some amazing results for its time. First released in 2950, this model allowed Mech's limited vision of heat sources, while removing backwash and interference from 'Mech weapon systems and operation by adding very heavy shielding to the Thermal Imaging Unit.
content.content: Совершенное тепловое зрение на боевом мехе потребовало много времени и усилий со стороны Doering. Optical 320 Suite показывал удивительные для своего времени результаты. Впервые выпущенная в 2950 году, эта модель позволяла мехам видеть ограниченное количество источников тепла, одновременно устраняя обратную засветку и помехи от систем вооружения и работы мехов путем добавления очень тяжелого экранирования к блоку тепловидения.

content.original: The BattleMech Lance is a special melee weapon designed to pierce armor plating. Unlike the medieval weapon of the same name, the Lance is a long, thin spike that juts out from a 'Mech's arm; it is not a large spear-like weapon carried in the hand. In combat the Lance pierces the armor plating of an enemy unit, possibly damaging or destroying internal systems.
content.prevOriginal: The BattleMech Lance is a special melee weapon designed to pierce armor plating. Unlike the medieval weapon of the same name, the Lance is a long, thin spike that juts out from a 'Mech's arm; it is not a large spear-like weapon carried in the hand. In combat the Lance pierces the armor plating of an enemy unit, possibly damaging or destroying internal systems.
content.content: Копье меха - это особое оружие ближнего боя, предназначенное для пробивания брони. content.original: The Chain Whip was made to entangle enemy 'Mechs. Tested in the Word of Blake assault on Solaris, the first iteration used pure myomers and wasn't effective. The Blakists made it work by adding additional armor alloy chains to reinforce the myomers. This version of the Chain Whip worked well. Despite its limited damage, the Blakists found it useful for immobilizing enemy forces.

content.original: The M-Pod is based on the A-Pod and B-Pod, but uses larger explosives and a more directional blast to damage hard targets. When activated it sprays targets with a mixture of shrapnel and 'Mech sized shotgun pellets. VOLATILE!

content.content: The M-Pod is based on the A-Pod and B-Pod, but uses larger explosives and a more directional blast to damage hard targets. Designed by engineers in the Solaris games, the M-Pod is essentially a modified canister of LB-X autocannon ammunition. When activated it sprays targets with a mixture of shrapnel and 'Mech sized shotgun pellets. ВЗРЫВООПАСНО!

content.original: Perfected Thermal Vision on a BattleMech took much time and dedication by Doering. The Optical 320 Suite managed to produce some amazing results for its time. First released in 2950, this model allowed 'Mechs limited vision of heat sources, while removing backwash and interference from 'Mech weapon systems and operation by adding very heavy shielding to the Thermal Imaging Unit.
content.prevOriginal: Perfected Thermal Vision on a BattleMech took much time and dedication by Doering, the Optical 320 Suite managed to produce some amazing results for its time. First released in 2950, this model allowed Mech's limited vision of heat sources, while removing backwash and interference from 'Mech weapon systems and operation by adding very heavy shielding to the Thermal Imaging Unit.
content.content: Создание совершенного теплового видения на боевом мехе потребовало много времени и усилий со стороны Doering. Optical 320 Suite показала удивительные для своего времени результаты. Впервые выпущенная в 2950 году, эта модель позволяла мехам видеть ограниченное количество источников тепла, одновременно устраняя обратную засветку и помехи от систем вооружения и работы мехов путем добавления очень сильного экранирования к блоку тепловидения.

content.original: An improvement on the original, Doering's Optical 570 Thermal Imaging Unit allowed more sensitive detection of foreign heat sources, at longer ranges.
content.prevOriginal: Perfected Thermal Vision on a BattleMech took much time and dedication by Doering, the Optical 320 Suite managed to produce some amazing results for its time. First released in 2950, this model allowed Mech's limited vision of heat sources, while removing backwash and interference from 'Mech weapon systems and operation by adding very heavy shielding to the Thermal Imaging Unit.
content.content: Улучшенный по сравнению с оригиналом, оптический тепловизор Doering 570 позволял более чувствительно обнаруживать посторонние источники тепла на ещё больших расстояниях.

content.original: With the release of the Optical 990 Imaging Suite, Doering has perfected thermal vision for 'Mechs. This model uses advanced materials to shield the electronics from local interference, greatly improving its effective range at only slightly increased weight.
content.prevOriginal: Perfected Thermal Vision on a BattleMech took much time and dedication by Doering, the Optical 320 Suite managed to produce some amazing results for its time. First released in 2950, this model allowed Mech's limited vision of heat sources, while removing backwash and interference from 'Mech weapon systems and operation by adding very heavy shielding to the Thermal Imaging Unit.
content.content: С выпуском набора оптики Optical 990 Imaging Suite компания Doering усовершенствовала систему теплового видения для мехов. В этой модели используются передовые материалы для экранирования электроники от локальных помех, что значительно повышает дальность действия за счет незначительного увеличения веса.

content.original: DEPLOYS A UAV UNDER YOUR CONTROL. May be either the default UAV or other compatible units from Beacons you own aboard the Argo. Costs 10,000 C-Bills per use! Press the button, then hold Shift while placing the unit to open the selection menu! Basic UAV carries a BA RL5. It can Sensor ping enemies in a 30 meter radius with a 3 turn cooldown. 20 armor, 10/15 move, 150 meter fly height.
content.prevOriginal: DEPLOYS A UAV FROM THE UNIT'S STORAGE. May be either the default UAV or other compatible units from Beacons you own. Costs 10,000 C-Bills per use! It can Sensor ping enemies in a 30 meter radius with a 3 turn cooldown. 20 armor, 10/15 move, 150 meter fly height.
content.content: ЗАПУСКАЕТ БПЛА ПОД ВАШИМ КОНТРОЛЕМ. Это может быть как БПЛА по умолчанию, так и другие совместимые устройства с Beacons, если они у вас есть на борту «Арго». Стоимость 10.000 C-bills за запуск! Нажмите Shift+ЛКМ при размещении устройства на земле, чтобы открыть меню выбора! Базовый БПЛА несёт на себе BA RL5. Он может делать Sensor Ping в радиусе 30 метров с перезарядкой 3 хода. 20 брони, 10/15 передвижение, высота полета 150 метров.

content.original: Based on the weapon used by infantry for centuries, the Mech Mortar fires a small shell in a high arc that falls onto the target. Though the Mech Mortar was created by the Terran Hegemony, by 2835 the Succession Wars had relegated it to history. With the reintroduction of the Anti-Missile System, engineers revived the Mech Mortar concept. The munitions used by the mortars, though often possessing limited guidance packages, weren't destroyed by AMS systems in tests. Mortar shells also proved very adaptable, accepting several types of payloads.
content.prevOriginal: Based on the weapon used by infantry for centuries, the Mech Mortar fires a small shell in a high arc that falls onto the target. Though the Mech Mortar was created by the Terran Hegemony, by 2835 the Succession Wars had relegated it to history. With the reintroduction of the Anti-Missile System, engineers revived the Mech Mortar concept. The munitions used by the mortars, though often possessing limited guidance packages, weren't destroyed by AMS systems in tests. Mortar shells also proved very adaptable, accepting several types of payloads.
content.content: Созданный на основе оружия, веками использовавшегося пехотой, версия мортиры для мехов стреляет небольшим снарядом по высокой дуге, который падает на цель. Хотя мортиры были созданы ещё Гегемонией Терры, к 2835 году из-за Войн за Наследие они ушли в историю. С возрождением противоракетной системы, инженеры возродили и концепцию мортир для мехов. Боеприпасы, используемые мортирами, хотя часто и имели ограниченные возможности наведения, на тестах не сбивались системами AMS. Снаряды мортир также оказались очень адаптируемыми, допуская различные их типы.

content.original: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller fighters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.prevOriginal: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller ﬁghters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.content: Не столь мощная, как ракеты «воздух-воздух» Arrow, представленные лиранцами и Волками, эта гораздо более компактная версия ракеты «воздух-воздух» дебютировала в составе совместных воздушно-космических сил герцогства Тамаринд и движения сопротивления герцогини Алис Руссо-Марик. Эти так называемые лёгкие ракеты класса «воздух-воздух» (LAA), имеющие меньшие размеры и меньшее сопротивление при полёте в атмосфере, могут использоваться техникой меньшего размера. При должной смекалке, команда техов может даже прикрутить их к меху в качестве средства ПВО.

content.original: The Thunderbolt Missile was developed for the arenas of Solaris. Unlike most missile systems, the Thunderbolt was a single missile that smashed into its target. Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.

content.original: The M-Pod is based on the A-Pod and B-Pod, but uses larger explosives and a more directional blast to damage hard targets. Designed by engineers in the Solaris games, the M-Pod is essentially a modified canister of LB-X autocannon ammunition. When activated it sprays targets with a mixture of shrapnel and 'Mech sized shotgun pellets. VOLATILE!

content.original: The Thunderbolt Missile was developed for the arenas of Solaris. Unlike most missile systems, the Thunderbolt was a single missile that smashed into its target. Though it was effective in the arenas, it didn't see widespread use in the field because the single missile was very vulnerable to Anti-Missile Systems. The missile launcher, though small, was awkward to mount and would only fit on the left or right torso of a 'Mech.
